text_block_list.text: Today, Espoir City is showing the new students around one of the shopping districts by Tracen that is often visited by students and trainers.
Alright, you better prepare yerselves! Today I'm gonna hammer into all of you the ins and outs of this city, got it?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
New Students
text_block_list.text: O-Okay…!
See this? This here's the closest shopping district to the school.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: It's kind of a dump, but hey, they got pretty much everything you'll need, so it ain't all bad.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
Prudent Student
text_block_list.text: She seems to be in a good mood today. This might be a good chance to get to know her better.
If we do, then I'm sure it'll be easier to talk with her, too. Okay, let's be straight-up with her!
text_block_list.name: Sincere Student

text_block_list.text: Hey, what're you all whispering about?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: N-Nothing! Actually, we were wondering if you had any recommendations for shops.
text_block_list.name: Careless Student

text_block_list.text: Recommendations? Guess I'd say the taiyaki stall. Plus, they have not just red bean, but a really yummy cream taiya—
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: But I don't like taiyaki that much, 'kay?! Got it?! 'Cause first of all, you ain't gonna soften me up with some sweets!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
Sincere Student
text_block_list.text:
Eeeek! 
She got mad at us!

The ramen at this place ain't half bad. 
They make a mean tonkotsu and chicken broth soup.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: It smells amazing! Okay, I'm gonna order a large!
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student
Sincere Student
text_block_list.text:
Alright, then I'll get a large order, too! 
W-Will you get a large too, Espoir City…?
Huuuh? 'Course I wouldn't half-ass things like that! I'm gonna get… the Extra-Large Olympus Bowl! Yeah, the Olympus Bowl!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
Careless Student
text_block_list.text: O-Olympus?!

text_block_list.name: Herculean Shop Owner
text_block_list.text:
Hup, one Extra-Large Olympus Bowl coming right up! 
O Mighty Zeus, witness this mighty warrior's proud visage!
Eep! The serving's so large, I can't even see Espoir City's face on the other side of it!
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student

text_block_list.text:
Q-Quit bein' such a scaredy-cat! 
Just witness the legend I'm 'bouta make!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Uuugh… my tummy kinda hurts… n-not! I'm just tired, that's all! You punks better go take a rest over there too.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City
Prudent Student
text_block_list.text:
Do you think she's gonna be okay? 
She's kind of got the aura of a stanced-up hedgehog…

I wonder if the other upperclassmen are all prickly like her. 
I dunno if I can hack it at this school…
text_block_list.name: Sincere Student

text_block_list.text:
Y'want me to do something about all this?! 
Ugh… do you ever shut up?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: I've just been doin' things how I see fit ever since the start of this mess. You seriously had no idea this is how it'd end up?
choice_data_list: The new students seem pretty anxious.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Urk…
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Auuugghhh! Well, what'm I supposed to do about it?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: It seems like even Espoir City is bothered by it, too. It'd be great if she could just be nice to them without any reservations, but…
Espoir City only shows her awkward inner self to those she knows and trusts, however imperfectly, and have forged a bond of trust.
The first thing I ought to do is try and build that kind of bond between her and the new students.

Aaalright, listen up, ya punks. 
I want you to go 'n buy something.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: O-Of course! Would you like some yakisoba bread? Or a cream bun?
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student

text_block_list.text: Course not! Didn't y'all leave your parents' places and come here on your own?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: That means y'gotta buy at least one or two souvenirs to send home, got it?! They sell pretty much anythin' in this mall, so it ain't hard.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Huh…? I have no idea what to buy… 
What should we do?
text_block_list.name: New Students

text_block_list.text: Hmph. I did every little thing you told me to, but… these kids are totally clueless. You really think things're gonna change like this?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Ha! Only one way to find out.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Souvenirs, huh… actually, now that I think about it, whenever Mom calls me, it's always just me reassuring her over and over that I'm alright…
text_block_list.name: Sincere Student

text_block_list.text: What, your mom? Tch…
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Actually, the reason I'm aiming for the Twinkle Series is because I've always looked up to my mom's races.
text_block_list.name: Sincere Student

text_block_list.text: Well, obviously she's worried sick about you 'cause she knows how damn tough racing can be.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Tch. How about you buy something from that specialty sweets shop over there? Maybe your mom had something like it before, iunno.
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Um, well, I want my family to see me win a big, important graded race and make them super happy, something like that…
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student

text_block_list.text: Hm. Then you should buy some binoculars. Binoculars, you got it? When you take the gold, you want your family to be able to see it, don'tcha?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Binoculars… binoculars, huh…
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Huh? A-Are you picking out a pair for me?
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student

text_block_list.text: Hey! There ain't binoculars or squat here! What kinda stores do you find binoculars in, anyway?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: Eek! I don't know!
text_block_list.name: Prudent Student

text_block_list.text: My mom was actually against me doing the whole racing thing… but I kinda ignored her and came here anyway.
text_block_list.name: Careless Student

text_block_list.text: Maybe I should get her something she'd like, at least…
text_block_list.name: Careless Student

text_block_list.text: Whassat?! You think you can breeze over that bit?! Listen, the two of you are fightin' right now, yeah?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: So forget about food right now! At the very least, you better write her a letter n' apologize, even if it's crap!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text: G-Got it! Then… I'm gonna buy some stationery!
text_block_list.name: Careless Student
Prudent Student
text_block_list.text: I-Is it just me, or…

text_block_list.name: Sincere Student
text_block_list.text: No, you're right. She does have a foul mouth, and she tends to randomly snap at people, but she's actuallly kind of…
Little by little, Espoir City gets to know her underclassmen, and even gets along with them. The rest of the souvenir-buying goes along without a hitch.

text_block_list.name: School Staff
text_block_list.text: Now then, about Espo…
She's received glowing praise from the new students! They said she's a bit scary, but overall very kind.
text_block_list.name: School Staff
School Staff
text_block_list.text: To sum things up, all's well that ends well. Perhaps it was just needless worry on our part. Thank you very much for your time and effort.
It seems Espoir City's reputation has finally improved in the eyes of both the staff and students.
